methods.getIndex:
:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.ReadOnlyIndex) The (possibly-empty) index of a table location, or null if index information
 is unknown or does not exist for this table location.
methods.getLastModifiedTimeMillis:
:return: (long) The last modified time for a table location, in milliseconds from the epoch:
  NULL_TIME: Modification time information is unknown or does not exist for this location
  >= 0: The time this table was last modified, in milliseconds from the UTC epoch
methods.getSize:
:return: (long) The size of a table location:
 NULL_SIZE: Size information is unknown or does not exist for this location
  >= 0: The table location exists and has (possibly empty) data
methods.getStateLock: :return: (java.lang.Object) The Object that accessors should synchronize on if they want to invoke multiple getters with consistent results.
methods.setValues:
Set all state values.

:param index: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.ReadOnlyIndex) - The new index. Ownership passes to this holder; callers should
                              clone it if necessary.
:param lastModifiedTimeMillis: (long) - The new modification time
:return: (boolean) Whether any of the values changed

text:
Tool for generic multi-field "atomic" get/set of state values for a table location.
 NB: Possibly-concurrent usages should be externally synchronized.
